name: Dark and Porny
description: A combination between a Dark & Stormy and a Pornstar Martini
directions: First, pull out your mule cup or copper mugs. Then, fill each one with ice.
Pour the rum, passion fruit, and lime juice over the ice.
Top off the mug with ginger beer. Stir to combine.
Garnish your cup with a sprig of mint or half of a small passion fruit.
